title: 173: The Happy Equation
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Arthur Brooks, a researcher of happiness at Harvard, has distilled his research about happiness into a simple equation. Want to know how to be happy? Turns out this is the way.
itunes:author: Happy, Grumpy, Doc
itunes:subtitle: Who knew it was math all the way down?
itunes:summary: Arthur Brooks, a researcher of happiness at Harvard, has distilled his research about happiness into a simple equation. Want to know how to be happy? Turns out this is the way.
